eu_initiatives: Thematic Pillar on societal impact of pain and attending general healthcare awareness raising events in the EU Institutions e.g. as organised by patient organisations, as well as attendance of health-related European Parliament Interest Groups (e.g. on mental health and brain pain and mind).
relevant_communication: Supporting a client who co-sponsors a meeting or other form of event in the EU Institutions concerning the development of the meeting agenda, outreach/collaboration with other health-related organisations involved, and communications surrounding the event.
goals__remit: As a freelance consultant, I support healthcare/patient organisations and pharmaceutical companies with regard to patient advocacy relations and government affairs. The aim is to ensure that patients have a voice and active role in the decision making process within the pharmaceutical industry as well as more holistically in government affairs at national and European level.
